title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

examples.name: Authorization Submission
examples.label: Medical Authorization

disclaimers.details: Submission of this form is not guarantee of payment and subject to member eligibility. Authorizations not valid for non-covered services or services provided by a non-participating provider.
disclaimers.provider: For capitated Laboratory, Physical Therapy, or Radiology this member must be referred to the PCP's capitated provider. This information is available through the Eligibility & Benefits Inquiry transaction.
disclaimers.auth_not_required: new disclaimer for auth not required

examples.amend_unavailable_error_message: Only Authorizations submitted through NaviNet can be amended.

newborn_form.user_notice: Please enter the baby's name, gender and date of birth.

additional_provider_1.label: Assistant Surgeon
additional_provider_1.description: The location where the surgery will be performed.

additional_provider_1.label: Assistant Surgeon
additional_provider_1.description: The location where the surgery will be performed.

admission_type.helptext:
Elective: Patient is admitted through scheduling.
Urgent: Patient is admitted unscheduled through a recommendation by a provider.
Emergency: Patient is admitted unscheduled by a provider.
Newborn: Maternity admissions.
Trauma Center: Visit to a licensed trauma center/hospital as licensed by state or local government.
Unknown: The type of admission is not available.

level_of_service.helptext:
Elective: Patient is admitted through scheduling.
Urgent: Patient is admitted unscheduled through a recommendation by a provider.
Emergency: Patient is admitted unscheduled by a provider.

note_to_patients.text: This Authorization is valid at any location for the above group.

examples.error_message: Please call Aries Health Plan at 800-555-1324 to get this fixed.

instruction_links.content: Members with Direct Point-of-Service coverage only require authorizations for the following services: Physical Therapy, Occupational Therapy, Lab/X-Ray, and Spinal Manipulations.
Members with Direct Point-of-Service coverage only require authorizations for the following services: Physical Therapy, Occupational Therapy, Lab/X-Ray, and Spinal Manipulations.

servicing_provider_decision_support.benefit_tier_column_tooltip: Tiered Benefit Products offer different member cost-sharing by tier and offers members lower out-of-pocket costs (e.g. copayment) for most services when members are referred to a provider in the Preferred benefit tier.
servicing_provider_decision_support.program_column_tooltip: Value Option: A program of high quality providers as based on quality metrics as define by Aries. To learn more about how to become a high quality provider, contact Aries at 555-555-5555.

pre_screening_questions.question: Is this case the result of an event or accident at work?
pre_screening_questions.response: For workplace related illness or injury, it is likely that the patient's services are covered by the workers' compensation coverage under their employer. Please contact that carrier for payment authorization.

pre_screening_questions.question: Are you amending an existing authorization?
pre_screening_questions.response: To amend an existing authorization, please call 800-555-2387

pre_screening_questions.question: Are you requesting an authorization for a physical therapy extension?
pre_screening_questions.response: To extend an authorization for physical therapy, please call 800-555-8236

examples.tiers_info: Tiered Benefit Products offer members cost-sharing by tier and lower out-of-pocket costs (e.g., copayment) for most services when they are referred to a provider in the Preferred benefit tier.

examples.helptext:
Elective: Patient is admitted through scheduling.
Urgent: Patient is admitted unscheduled through a recommendation by a provider.
Emergency: Patient is admitted unscheduled by a provider.
Newborn: Maternity admissions.
Trauma Center: Visit to a licensed trauma center/hospital as licensed by state or local government.
Unknown: The type of admission is not available.
